featured.text: This is because many breakthroughs come up when people venture 20 their usual routines or areas of expertise.
Interestingly, when there are few howler monkeys in an area, the howling routine takes on a different pattern.

definition.zh_def: 例行公事；常規，固定的程序或活動。
definition.en_def: A regular or habitual procedure or activity.
definition.example: She follows her morning routine every day.
